title: Elegance Watch Face
summary: Elegance Watch Face for Android Wear watch with extremely low power consumption
description: Elegance Watch Face for Android Wear watches.Simple and elegant style is combined with extremely low power consumption of highly optimized watch face.It takes only a few milliseconds to render the watch face which leads to a longer battery life.Accent color can be easily changed in settings. Ambient mode has also an elegant and readable style.
descriptionHTML:
Elegance Watch Face for Android Wear watches.

Simple and elegant style is combined with extremely low power consumption of highly optimized watch face.
It takes only a few milliseconds to render the watch face which leads to a longer battery life.

Accent color can be easily changed in settings. Ambient mode has also an elegant and readable style.
